spirit:field.spirit:name: EMPH
spirit:field.spirit:description: Emphasis code from the channel status block

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Signal is non-audio 1: Signal is audio

spirit:field.spirit:name: PRO
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Signal format is consumer 1: Signal format is professional

spirit:field.spirit:name: LOCK
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Receiver has no valid input signal 1: Receiver is locked to SPDIF signal

spirit:field.spirit:name: PARITYB
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error channel B interrupt mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: PARITYA
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error channel A interrupt mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: HSBF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Higher sample buffer full interrupt mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: LSBF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Lower sample buffer full interrupt mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: LOCK
spirit:field.spirit:description: Change in lock bit interrupt mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: PARITYB
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error detected on channel B

spirit:field.spirit:name: PARITYA
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error detected on channel A

spirit:field.spirit:name: CDATA
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: User data is captured 1: Channel status data is captured

spirit:field.spirit:name: CHID
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Source is channel A 1: Source is channel B

spirit:field.spirit:name: BITLEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Capture function disabled 1-32: Length of bit-field to be captured

spirit:field.spirit:name: Channel_status_buffer
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Channel status buffer not available 1: Channel status buffer available

spirit:field.spirit:name: User_data_buffer
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: User data buffer not available 1: User data buffer available

spirit:field.spirit:name: RATIO
spirit:field.spirit:description: Clock divider for the transmit frequency

spirit:field.spirit:name: TINTEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Interrupt output is disabled 1: Interrupt output is enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXDATA
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Data from buffer not transmitted 1: Data from buffer transmitted

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0: Transmitter is disabled 1: Transmitter is enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: HCSBF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Higher channel status/user data buffer empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCSBF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Lower channel status/user data buffer empty
